context: great, thanks! I absolutely love the Harry Potter movies, and most movies based on great books- you have any ideas of a good one to watch tonight that's similar? I really liked The Chronicles of Narnia as well!
resp: Those are great movies I never really got into them. I always enjoyed reading my stephen king books and then watching those movies. There are a number of great ones like Cujo (1983) .
